channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Stocks could rally another 50% in two years, BofA says
item.description: Data: Financial Modeling Prep ; Chart: Axios Visuals The bull market has legs that could power the S&P 500 to a peak of 9,914 in September 2027, says ...

item.title: RFK Jr.'s power play faces key September tests
item.description: After roiling the leadership of the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, Health Secretary Robert F. Kennedy Jr. is poised to make more moves th...

item.title: National Guard illegally performed law enforcement in LA, judge rules
item.description: The Trump administration illegally instructed the National Guard to perform law enforcement activities during anti-ICE protests in Los Angeles, a fede...

item.title: Behind the Curtain: Why you should be AI-obsessed
item.description: Several readers have asked why we're so AI-obsessed in our columns and business planning. Our response: Imagine knowing electricity or the internet we...

item.title: OpenAI outlines new mental health guardrails for ChatGPT
item.description: ChatGPT guardrails for teens and people in emotional distress will roll out by the end of the year, OpenAI promised Tuesday. Why it matters: Stories a...

item.title: Trump administration use of National Guard in L.A. violated law, judge rules
item.description: The judge sharply reprimanded the Trump administration for its use of troops during immigration actions. He also stayed his ruling until next week.

item.title: Congress to tackle Epstein files controversy as it returns from recess
item.description: Legislative efforts continue to force the release of the Epstein files.

item.title: Trump amps up rhetoric toward Chicago as Democrats prepare for showdown
item.description: The president has not detailed any plans for Chicago yet but has said it would be “probably next” after he sent the National Guard to Washington.

item.title: Congress returns with not much time to dodge a government shutdown
item.description: Lawmakers haven’t settled on a plan to pass spending legislation. The GOP will need to find Democratic votes in the Senate.

item.title: Eighty years after WWII’s end, the consensus it forged is crumbling
item.description: On Sept. 2, 1945, Japan surrendered, launching an era of alliances and trade. Now, with memories of the war fading, so is the consensus on how to avoi...

item.title: Former Trump statistics chief slams Friday firing of Erika McEntarfer
item.description: Bill Beach said the president's suggestions that the jobs report was rigged betrayed a misunderstanding in how those numbers are assembled.

item.title: Trump fires statistics chief after soft jobs report
item.description: The monthly jobs report showed just 73,000 jobs in July, with big reductions to May's and June's numbers

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
